sentences.sCn: 一只悄悄跟踪猎物的老虎

sentences.sContent: We know the rapist stalks his victims at night.
sentences.sCn: 我们知道那个强奸犯在夜间偷偷地跟踪受害人。

synos.tran: （植物的）茎，秆；（支持叶子、果实和花的）[植]梗，[生物]柄；追踪；高视阔步
高视阔步地走；潜近，偷偷接近

remMethod.val: 他一句话不说(talk)， 趾高气扬地走(stalk)了

trans.tranCn: 偷偷接近； 跟踪； 趾高气扬地走
trans.tranOther: to follow a person or animal quietly in order to catch and attack or kill them
a long narrow part of a plant that supports leaves, fruits, or flowers
